S04n431:1: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena rudrako nāma rāmaputro rājagṛhaṃ nāma mahānagaramupanisṛtya viharati sma mahatā śiṣyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saptabhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ |
S04n431:2: sa tebhyo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma |
S04n431:3: adrākṣīt khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputraṃ saṃghegaṇinaṃ gaṇācāryaṃ jñātamabhīpsitaṃ bahujanapūjitaṃ paṇḍitasaṃmatam |
S04n431:4: dṛṣṭvā cāsyaitadabhūt-ayaṃ khalvapi rudrako rāmaputraḥ saṃghegaṇī gaṇācāryaḥ jñāto'bhīpsito bahujanapūjitaḥ paṇḍitasaṃmataḥ |
S04n431:6: naiṣa mamāntike viśiṣṭasaṃjño bhavennāpi pratyakṣajñānena jñāto bhavennāpi saṃskṛtānāṃ sāśravānāṃ sopādānānāṃ dhyānasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ doṣo datto bhavet |
S04n431:7: yannvahaṃ tathārupamupāyamupasaṃdarśayeyaṃ yenaite ca pratyakṣā bhaveyuḥ |
S04n431:8: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca samāpattyārambaṇānāṃ laukikasamādhīnāmaniḥsaraṇatā darśitā bhavet |
S04n431:9: yannvahaṃ rudrakasya rāmaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya svasamādhiguṇaviśeṣodbhāvanārthaṃ śiṣyatvamabhyupagamya saṃskṛtasamādhīnāmasāratāmupadarśayeyamiti ||
S04n431:10: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattva idamarthavaśamadhikṛtya yena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n431:13: ityevamukte rudrako rāmaputro bodhisattvamevamāha-na me mārṣa kaścicchāstā |
S04n431:14: api tu khalu punaḥ svayameva mayedaṃ samyagadhigatamiti |
S04n431:17: bodhisattva āha-labhemahi vayaṃ bhavataḥ sakāśādavavādānuśāsanīyasya samādhermārgam?
S04n431:20: tato bodhisattva ekāntaṃ gatvā paryaṅkamābhujyopaviśati sma |
S04n431:21: samanantaropaviṣṭasya ca bodhisattvasya puṇyaviśeṣeṇa ca jñānaviśeṣeṇa ca pūrvasucaritacaryāphalaviśeṣeṇa ca sarvasamādhiparicayaviśeṣeṇa ca dhyānapramukhāni sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi samāpattiśatānyāmukhībhavanti sma sākārāṇi soddeśāni yathāpi taccittavaśavartitvāt |
S04n431:22: atha ca bodhisattvaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan utthāyāsanādyena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n431:23: upasaṃkramya rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha astyanyo'pi mārṣa kaściduttare naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattermārgaḥ?
S04n431:25: tato bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat-na khalu rudrakasyaivāsti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā |
S04n431:26: mamāpyasti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā |
S04n431:27: atha bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha-mayāpyeṣa mārṣa dharmo'dhigato yatra tvaṃ niryātaḥ |
S04n431:29: tvaṃ cāhaṃ cemaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharāva iti |
S04n431:30: samānārthe ca bodhisattvaṃ sthāpayati sma ācāryasthāne ca |
S04n431:31: bodhisattva āha-naiṣa mārṣa mārgo nirvṛtaye na virāgāya na nirodhāya nopaśamāya nābhijñāyai na saṃbodhaye na śrāmaṇāya na brāhmaṇāya na nirvāṇāya saṃvartate ||
S04n431:32: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakasya rāmaputrasya saśiṣyasyāvarjanīkṛtva yāvadalamiti kṛtvā prakrāmat-alaṃ mamāneneti ||
S04n431:33: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrake rāmaputre brahmacaryaṃ caranti sma |
S04n431:34: teṣāmetadabhūt-yasya khalu vayamarthāya dīrgharātraṃ ghaṭāmahe udyujyāmahe,
S04n431:35: na ca śaknumo'ntaṃ vā paryantaṃ cādhigantum,
S04n431:42: evaṃ vimṛṣya pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrakarāmaputrasakāśādapakramya bodhisattvamanvabadhnan ||
S04n431:43: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya magadheṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmat sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ ||
S04n431:44: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāntarācca rājagṛhasya antarācca gayāyā yo'nyatamo gaṇa utsavaṃ karoti sma,
S04n431:45: tena ca gaṇena bodhisattvo'bhinimantrito'bhūt vāsena bhaktena ca sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ ||
S04n431:46: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ gayā tāmanusṛtya tāmanuprāpto'bhūt |
S04n431:47: tatra khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ prahāṇārthī viharati sma gayāśīrṣe parvate |
S04n431:48: tatrāsya viharatastisra upamāḥ pratibhānti sma aśrutapūrvā anabhijñātapūrvāḥ |
S04n431:50: ye kecitte khalvapi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo'navakṛṣṭakāyā viharanti sma |
S04n431:52: yāpi caiṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānatā,
S04n431:54: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante |
S04n431:55: atha tarhi abhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum |
S04n431:56: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇīmudake prakṣipya mathnīyāt,
S04n431:58: evameva ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo'navakṛṣṭakāyā anavakṛṣṭacittāśca viharanti,
S04n431:59: yāpyeṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānaṃ tadapyanupaśāntam |
S04n431:60: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante |
S04n431:62: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamā upamā pratibhāti sma ||
S04n431:63: bhūyaścāsyaitadabhūt-ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
S04n431:64: yāpi teṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ kartavyaṃ yāvajjyotiṃ paryeṣata iti |
S04n431:65: sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya sthale sthāpayitvā ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ mathnīyāt,
S04n431:67: evameva ye ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ pūrvavatkāryaṃ yāvadabhavyā uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum |
S04n431:68: iyaṃ dvitīyā upamā pratibhāti sma pūrvamaśrutā cāvijñātā ca ||
S04n431:69: punaraparaṃ ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bhavantaḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
S04n431:73: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante |
S04n431:74: atha khalu punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum |
S04n431:75: tadyathāpi nāma iha syātpuruṣo'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiḥ paryeṣamāṇaḥ,
S04n431:76: sa śuṣkaṃ kāṣṭhamādāya śuṣkāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ sthale pratiṣṭhāpya mathnīyāt,
S04n431:78: evameva ya ime bhavantaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedayanta iti |
S04n431:79: atha ca punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum |
S04n431:80: iyaṃ tṛtīyā upamā pratibhāti sma aśrutapūrvā ca avijñātapūrvā ca ||
S04n431:81: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt-ahaṃ khalvetarhi kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyo viharāmi vyapakṛṣṭacittaśca |
S04n431:82: yāpi me kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ yāvattadapi me upaśāntam |
S04n431:83: kiṃ cāpi ahamātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāmiti peyālaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedmi |
S04n431:85: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ gayāyāṃ vihṛtya gayāśīrṣe parvate jaṅgāvihāramanucaṃkramyamāṇo yenorubilvā senāpatigrāmakastadanusṛtastadanuprāpto'bhūt |
S04n431:86: tatrādrākṣīnnadīṃ nairañjanāmacchodakāṃ sūpatīrthāṃ prāsādikaiśca drumagulmairalaṃkṛtāṃ samantataśca gocaragrāmām |
S04n431:87: tatra khalvapi bodhisattvasya mano'tīva prasannamabhūt-samo batāyaṃ bhūmipradeśo ramaṇīyaḥ pratisaṃlayanānurūpaḥ |
S04n431:91: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhut-pañcakaṣāyakāle'hamiha jambudvīpe'vatīrṇo hīnādhimuktikeṣu sattveṣvākīrṇatīrthyavargeṣu nānādṛṣṭipraskanneṣu kāyapiṇḍagrāhābhiniviṣṭeṣu nānāvidhaiścātāpanaparitāpanaiḥ kāyaśuddhiṃ paryeṣante,
S04n431:96: ekabhaktā ekāhorātracāturthyapañcaṣaṭkālāntarāśca pakṣakṣapaṇamāsakṣapaṇacāndrāyaṇaiśca gṛdhrolūkapakṣadhāraṇaiśca phalamuñjāsanavalkaladarbhabalbajoṣṭrakambalājakambalakeśakambalacarmaniveśanaiśca ārdrapaṭāstopakajālaśayanaiśca bhasmaśarkarāpāṣāṇaphalakakaṇṭakatṛṇamusalaśayanāvākchirotkuṭukasthaṇḍilaśayanaiśca ekavāsadvitricatuṣpañcaṣaṭsaptabahuvāsobhirnagnabhāvaiśca sthānāsthānavidhibhiśca dīrghakeśanakhaśmaśrujaṭāmakuṭadhāraṇaiśca ekakolatilataṇḍulāhāraiśca bhasmamasinirmālyoddhṛtatamorajapāṃśupaṅkaparimrakṣaṇaiśca lomamuñjakeśanakhacīvarapañjarakaraṅkadhāraṇaiśca uṣṇodakataṇḍulodakaparisrāvitakāmbalikasthālīpānīyapānaiśca aṅgāradhātukaṣāyatridaṇḍamuṇḍikakuṇḍikakapālakhaṭvāṅgadhāraṇaiśca śuddhiṃ pratyavagacchanti saṃmūḍhāḥ |
S04n431:109: iha ca kecitparatra manyante svargāpavargāvasmākametebhyo nirvartsyeta iti mithyāmārgaprayātā aśaraṇe śaraṇasaṃjñino'maṅgalye maṅgalasaṃjñino'śuddhyā śuddhiṃ manyatoyannvahaṃ tādṛśaṃ vratatapoviśeṣamālabheyaṃ yathā sarvaparapravādinaśca nigṛhītāḥ syuḥ,
S04n431:111: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ dhyānaviśeṣopadarśanādāvarjanaṃ kuryāmiti ||
S04n431:112: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattva evaṃ cintayitvā ṣaḍvarṣikaṃ mahāghoraṃ vratatapaḥsuduṣkarātsuduṣkarāṃ duṣkaracaryāmālabhate sma |
S04n431:116: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā,
S04n431:121: sa caturthadhyānamādita eva samāpadyamāna āśvāsapraśvāsānuparodhayati saṃnirodhayati |
S04n431:122: akalpaṃ tad dhyānamavikalpamaniñjanamapanītamaspandanaṃ sarvatrānugataṃ ca sarvatra cāniśritam |
S04n431:123: na ca tad dhyānaṃ jātu kenacitsamāpannaṃ pūrvaṃ śaiṣyeṇa vā aśaiṣyeṇa vā pratyekabuddhena vā caryāpratipannena vā bodhisattvena |
S04n431:125: ākāśamaspharaṇamakaraṇamavikaraṇaṃ tacca sarvaṃ spharatīti hyākāśasamaṃ tad dhyānam |
S04n431:127: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyāścaryasaṃdarśanārthaṃ tīrthikānāṃ ca darpanirghātanārthaṃ parapravādināṃ ca nigrahārthaṃ devānāṃ cāvarjanārthamucchedaśāśvatavādināṃ ca sattvānāṃ krarmakriyāpraṇaṣṭānāṃ karmakriyāvatāraṇārthaṃ puṇyaphalodbhāvanārthaṃ jñānaphalasaṃdarśanārthaṃ dhyānāṅgavibhajanārtha kāyabalasthāmasaṃdarśanārthaṃ cittaśauryasaṃjananārthaṃ ca asaṃskṛtāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ paryaṅkamābhujya niṣīdati sma |
S04n431:128: niṣadya ca svakāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇīte sma,
S04n431:130: tato me bhikṣavo haimantikāsvaṣṭakarātriṣu tathā kāyaṃ nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma |
S04n431:132: bhūmau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ |
S04n431:133: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣo durbalataraṃ puruṣaṃ grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣpīḍayet,
S04n431:134: evameva bhikṣava imaṃ kāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma |
S04n431:136: bhūbhau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ ||
S04n431:137: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-yannvahamāsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyam |
S04n431:138: tato me bhikṣava āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyato mukhato nāsikātaścāśvāsapraśvāsā upaniruddhāvabhūtām |
S04n431:140: tadyathāpi nāma karmāragagayā mathyamānāyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati,
S04n431:141: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikābhyāmāśvāsapraśvāsāvuparuddhāvabhūtāṃ śrotachidrābhyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati sma ||
S04n431:142: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-yannvahaṃ bhūya āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyamiti |
S04n431:145: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ puruṣaḥ kuṇḍayā śaktyā śiraḥkapālamupahanyād,
S04n431:146: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikāśrotreṣūparuddheṣu āśvāsapraśvāsā urdhvaṃ śiraḥkapālamupanighnanti sma ||
S04n431:147: tāṃ cāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvasya tatra keciddevā evamāhu-kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ kālagato batāyaṃ siddhārthaḥ kumāraḥ |
S04n431:159: atha te devaputrāstrāyatriṃśeṣu deveṣu gatvā māyādevyā evamarthaṃ śrāvayanti-kālagataḥ kumāraḥ |
S04n431:160: atha māyādevī apsarāgaṇaparivṛtā ardharātrasamaye nairañjanāyāstīre yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāntā |
S04n431:164: yadā jāto'si me putra vane lumbinisāhvaye |
S04n431:166: diśāṃ cālokya cature vācā te pravyāhṛtā śubhā |
S04n431:167: iyaṃ me paścimā jātiḥ sā te na paripūritā ||4 ||
S04n431:169: kṣuṇṇaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tasya na dṛṣṭā tena nityatā ||5 ||
S04n431:171: na ca bodhimanuprāpto yāto'si nidhanaṃ vane ||6 ||
S04n431:172: putrārthe kaṃ prapadyāmi kaṃ va krandāmi duḥkhitā |
S04n431:180: mayā tu daśamāsāṃ vai kukṣau vajra ivā dhṛtaḥ |
S04n431:181: sā te'haṃ putrakā mātā vilapāmi suduḥkhitā ||9 ||
S04n431:193: sahaśravaṇādeva devī māyā saṃpraharṣitaromakūpajātā bodhisattvaṃ māndāravapuṣpairabhyavakirya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtvā divyatūryaiḥ saṃpravādyamānairyena svabhavanaṃ tenopajagāma ||
S04n431:194: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-santyeke śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye alpāhāratayā śuddhiṃ manyante |
S04n431:197: syātkhalu punarbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ eṣā buddhiḥ-mahattaraṃ tatra kāle kolamāsīditi |
S04n431:200: tasya me bhikṣava ekameva kolamāhāramāharato'dvitīyaṃ kāyo'tyarthaṃ karśito'bhūddurbalaḥ |
S04n431:201: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava āsītakīparvāṇi vā kālāparvāṇi vā,
S04n431:205: tadyathāpi nāma vāhanakāraśālāyāṃ vā hastiśālāyāṃ vā jīrṇāyāmubhayato vivṛtāyāṃ gopānasyāntarikāśca virājante vyavabhāsante,
S04n431:206: evameva me pārśukā antaḥkāye ubhayato virājante sma vyavabhāsante sma |
S04n431:207: tadyathāpi nāma vartanyā veṇī unnatāvanatā bhavati samaviṣamā,
S04n431:209: tadyathā tiktakālābustaruṇo lūna āmlāno bhavati saṃmlānaḥ samutpuṭakajātaḥ evameva śira āmlānamabhūtsaṃmlānaṃ samutpuṭakajātam |
S04n431:210: tadyathāpi nāma grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse kūpatārakā dūragatā bhavanti,
S04n431:212: evameva me'kṣitārakau duragatāvabhūtāṃ kṛcchreṇa saṃprakāśyete sma |
S04n431:215: tato yadāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ pāṇinā kukṣiṃ spṛśāmīti pṛṣṭhikaṇṭakamevāsprākṣam |
S04n431:217: tataḥ kṛcchreṇotthito'pi pāṃśukṛtāni gātrāṇi pāṇinā pramṛjato me pūtiromāṇi kāyācchīryante sma |
S04n431:218: yāpi me'bhūtpaurāṇī śubhavarṇatanuḥ sāpyantaradhādyathāpīdaṃ rūkṣapradhānaṃ prahitātmanaḥ |
S04n431:219: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsina evaṃ saṃjānante sma-kālako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ |
S04n431:224: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-yannvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayālpāhāratayā pratipadyeyamiti |
S04n431:226: syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākamevaṃ mahattaraṃ taṇḍulaṃ tasmin kāle'bhūditi |
S04n431:229: tasya me bhikṣava ekaṃ taṇḍulamāharataḥ kṣipraṃ kāyo'bhūditi pūrvavadyāvanmadguracchavirbata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautama iti |
S04n431:231: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-yannvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayālpāhāratāyai pratipadyeyamiti |
S04n431:235: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhut-santyeke śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye'nāhāratayā śuddhiṃ manyante |
S04n431:238: tasya me bhikṣavo'nāhārasya kāyo'tīva śuṣko'bhūt kṛśo durbalaḥ,
S04n431:239: tadyathāpi nāma āsitakīparvāṇi vā kālāparvāṇi vā |
S04n431:246: kṛcchreṇāpi cotthitaḥ pāṃśukṛtāni me gātrāṇi pramṛjataḥ pūtimūlāni romāṇyaśīryanta |
S04n431:250: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsino janā evaṃ saṃjānante sma-kālako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ |
S04n431:254: rājāpi tadā śuddhodanaḥ pratipratidivasaṃ bodhisattvasyāntike dūtaṃ preṣayati sma ||
S04n431:255: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyādbhutakriyāsaṃdarśanārthaṃ pūrvavadyāvatkarmakriyāpraṇaṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ karmakriyāvatāraṇārthaṃ puṇyasaṃcayānāṃ codbhāvanārthaṃ mahājñānasya ca guṇasaṃdarśanārthaṃ dhyānāṅgānāṃ ca vibhajanārthamekatilakolataṇḍulena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaracaryāmanuvartayantamupadarśayati sma |
S04n431:256: adīnamānasaḥ ṣaḍvarṣā bodhisattvo yathā niṣaṇṇa evāsthāt paryaṅkena |
S04n431:259: na ca vātātapavṛṣṭiparitrāṇamakaronna ca daṃśamaśakasarīsṛpānapanayati sma |
S04n431:268: ye ca tatrāgaman grāmakumārakā vā grāmakumārikā vā gopālakā vā paśupālakā vā tṛṇahārikā vā kāṣṭhahārikā vā gomayahārikā vā,
S04n431:273: yadasya karṇaśrotābhyāṃ tṛṇatūlakaṃ prakṣipya nāsāśrotābhyāṃ niṣkāsyate sma |
S04n431:278: ye ca te devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā bodhisattvasya guṇeṣu pratyakṣāḥ,
S04n431:279: te rātriṃdivaṃ samadhiṣṭhā bodhisattvasya pūjāṃ kurvanti sma |
S04n431:281: tatra bodhisattvena tai ṣaḍbhirvarṣairduṣkaracaryāṃ saṃdarśayatā paripūrṇāni dvādaśanayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ tribhiryānaiḥ paripācitānyabhūvan ||
S04n431:293: na ca yatra svānubhavatī na cāhitaṃ tena tiṣṭhavākyasya |
S04n431:298: apare bhramanti nagnāḥ satyamidaṃ mohamanyaditi mūḍhāḥ ||18 ||
S04n431:308: yaṃ duṣkaraṃ na śakyaṃ carituṃ devairmanuṣyairvā ||23 ||
S04n431:310: yaṃ dhyānaṃ na samarthāḥ pratyekajināpi darśayitum ||24 ||
S04n431:317: kalpaṃ no na vikalpaṃ na ceñjanaṃ nāpimanyena pracāram |
S04n431:319: na ca ātapātu chāyāṃ chāyāyā nātapaṃ gataścāsau |
S04n431:326: pāṃśupiśācakamiti taṃ manyante pāṃśunā ca mrakṣanti ||32 ||
S04n431:327: aśucīnā ca kirante vividhāste kāraṇāśca kārenti |
S04n431:328: na ca iñjate bhramati vā dhyāyatyāsphānakaṃ dhyānam ||33 ||
S04n431:329: na ca namati no vinamate na kāyaparirakṣaṇā spṛśati |
S04n431:330: kiṃcinnoccāraprasravaṃ śabdeṣu na saṃtrasī na paraprekṣī ||34 ||
S04n431:332: udarācca pṛṣṭhivaṃśo vidṛśyate vartitā yathā veṇī ||35 ||
S04n431:335: praṇidhiṃ ca kurvate te vayamapi tādṛśa bhavāmahe kṣipram |
S04n431:337: na ca kevalamātmārthaṃ na dhyānasvādanānna sukhabuddhyā |
S04n431:340: karmakriyā ca darśita yā proktā kāśyape vācā ||39 ||
S04n431:341: krakucchandakasya bodhi bodhiriha sudurlabhā bahubhi kalpaiḥ |
